title: Remote Education-Based Social Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science knowledge and proficiency in digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive mobile-based course providing practical learning experiences for analyzing social issues and developing solutions

learning_goals: Learners can visualize the structure of educational content by applying conceptual mapping techniques for analyzing social issues.
Learners can analyze digital materials in remote education settings and propose actionable solutions for real-world social problems.
Learners can design and evaluate social problem-solving projects collaboratively with peer learners using collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
